_comment: OPA392 - Precision, Low Noise, Rail-to-Rail Operational Amplifier configured as LNA with 20 dB gain
description: OPA392 Precision Low Noise Rail-to-Rail Op-Amp configured as LNA with 20 dB gain
_comment_G: Gain, dB (configured via external resistors for 20 dB gain)
_comment_NF: Noise Figure, dB (calculated from 4.4 nV/√Hz input noise at 10 kHz)
_comment_BW_LNA: Bandwidth, Hz (13 MHz gain-bandwidth product from datasheet)
_comment_Z_in: Input impedance, Ohms (very high for CMOS op-amp, typical >1 GOhm)
_comment_V_max: Maximum output voltage, V (rail-to-rail operation: 1.7V to 5.5V supply)
_comment_V_min: Minimum supply voltage, V (1.7V minimum from datasheet)
_comment_input_noise: Input voltage noise, V/√Hz (4.4 nV/√Hz at 10 kHz from datasheet)
_comment_input_bias_current: Input bias current, A (10 fA typical from datasheet)
_comment_offset_voltage: Input offset voltage, V (10 µV maximum from datasheet)
_comment_offset_drift: Offset voltage drift, V/°C (0.18 µV/°C typical)
_comment_gain_bandwidth: Gain-bandwidth product, Hz (13 MHz from datasheet)
_comment_slew_rate: Slew rate, V/µs (4.5 V/µs from datasheet)
_comment_settling_time: Settling time, seconds (0.75 µs to 0.1% for 1V step)
_comment_quiescent_current: Quiescent supply current, A (1.22 mA typical)
_comment_output_current: Output current capability, A (65 mA source, 55 mA sink)
_comment_EMI_RFI_filtering: EMI and RFI filtering on inputs
